ch0081_00_enjif/2701_1031_01_10:
I have so many friends,
I can’t play with them all!
ch0081_00_enjif/2701_1031_02_10:
I’m friends with everybody,
and everybody’s friends
with me!
ch0081_00_enjif/2701_1031_03_10:
Pokémon are my friends,
too! I like my friends.
ch0081_00_enjif/2701_0701_01_10:
My mommy says that friends are like stars.
You don’t always see them, but you know
they are there.
ch0081_00_enjif/2701_0701_02_10:
Did you know you can make friends
with people you play with?
ch0081_00_enjif/2701_0701_03_10: It would be cool if I could make 100 friends...
ch0081_00_enjif/2701_0701_04_10:
Oh boy! If I really do make 100 friends,
how will I remember everybody’s names?!
ch0081_00_enjif/2701_0702_01_10:
If I have a Pokémon battle with 100
different friends starting right now...
ch0081_00_enjif/2701_0702_02_10:
I think I’ll be a grown-up before
I get to the last person!
That would take forever!
ch0081_00_enjif/2702_1031_03_10:
And their abs are like
ice cube trays!
ch0081_00_enjif/2702_0701_01_10:
When I grow up, I wanna be big and strong
like Machamp.
ch0081_00_enjif/2702_0701_02_10:
What if I could beat Machamp at
arm wrestling? That would be so cool!
ch0081_00_enjif/2702_0701_04_10:
I could even give a Machamp
a piggyback ride!
ch0081_00_enjif/2702_0702_01_10:
There’s probably so much cool stuff
I can do once I’m a grown-up.
ch0081_00_enjif/2702_0702_02_10:
But...I still want Machamp to pick me up
and hold me even when I’m big.
ch0081_00_enjif/2703_1031_01_10:
I like playing
hide-and-seek with
Daddy’s Pidgeot.
ch0081_00_enjif/2703_1031_02_10:
No matter how far I run,
Pidgeot catches up!
ch0081_00_enjif/2703_1031_03_10:
Whizzing through the sky
is the best!
ch0081_00_enjif/2703_0701_01_10:
My daddy’s Pidgeot is the
bestest Pidgeot ever!
ch0081_00_enjif/2703_0701_02_10:
Even when I hide really good,
it always finds me right away!
ch0081_00_enjif/2703_0701_03_10:
And...and it even lets me ride it
high up where the clouds are!
ch0081_00_enjif/2703_0702_01_10: Daddy says Pidgeot spoils me too much.
ch0081_00_enjif/2703_0702_02_10:
But it doesn’t matter, ’cause Pidgeot
always takes my side! Tee-hee!
Just don’t tell Daddy... It’s a secret!
ch0081_00_enjif/2704_1031_01_10:
You shouldn’t treat people
like they’re little kids.
ch0081_00_enjif/2704_1031_02_10:
I’m a kid...but I act just
like a grown-up!
ch0081_00_enjif/2704_0701_01_10:
You shouldn’t judge people by
the way they look.
ch0081_00_enjif/2704_0701_02_10:
Sure, I may look like a
little preschooler...
ch0081_00_enjif/2704_0701_03_10:
but I’m actually... Well, I’m actually
still only four, so I guess I am a
preschooler just like I look...
ch0081_00_enjif/2704_0702_01_10:
You know how one day, Pokémon evolve
and change the way they look?
ch0081_00_enjif/2704_0702_02_10:
One day, I’m gonna evolve into a
grown-up, just like that.
ch0081_00_enjif/2704_0702_03_10:
It’ll be really exciting but also really sad.
I guess that’s life, though, huh.
